channel.title: Comments on: Free Gifts for Holiday Pre-Orders
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Jon! If you reserved your Kuri home robot today, you'd receive it in the spring. We'd send you the mini stuffed Kuri and prototype book ASAP so you get them during the holidays (and have something to put under the tree). :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Jon! If you reserved your Kuri home robot today, you’d receive it in the spring. We’d send you the mini stuffed Kuri and prototype book ASAP so you get them during the holidays (and have something to put under the tree). 🙂

item.title: By: Jon
item.dc:creator: Jon
item.description: Is there a December ship date yet? Want to put the plush robot and prototype book under the Christmas tree!
item.content:encoded: Is there a December ship date yet? Want to put the plush robot and prototype book under the Christmas tree!

item.title: By: Enoc
item.dc:creator: Enoc
item.description: Is it too late to Pre Order and get the cute stuff animal?
item.content:encoded: Is it too late to Pre Order and get the cute stuff animal?

item.title: By: Iva
item.dc:creator: Iva
item.description: I want to reserve my Kuri if I order it on sun dec 3 will I still get my free gift ??
item.content:encoded: I want to reserve my Kuri if I order it on sun dec 3 will I still get my free gift ??

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Travis! Right now, Kuri is only available in the U.S. We're focusing on shipping our adorable home robot in the States this year, and will explore an international release in the future. Stay tuned for updates! :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Travis! Right now, Kuri is only available in the U.S. We’re focusing on shipping our adorable home robot in the States this year, and will explore an international release in the future. Stay tuned for updates! 🙂

item.title: By: Travis Dosser
item.dc:creator: Travis Dosser
item.description: When will they be available in Canada? I would pre-order but there is no Canada option.
item.content:encoded: When will they be available in Canada? I would pre-order but there is no Canada option.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Olivia, We will begin shipping some Kuris next month. Please email us at support@heykuri.com to check your Kuri's shipment status.
item.content:encoded: Hi Olivia, We will begin shipping some Kuris next month. Please email us at support@heykuri.com to check your Kuri’s shipment status.
